Bases: APIView
API to get third party auth providers, optional fields, required fields, user country code and the currently running pipeline.
Returns - dynamic registration fields - dynamic optional fields - the context for third party auth providers - user country code - the currently running pipeline.

list_item.paragraph: request (HttpRequest) â€“ The request, used to determine if a pipeline is currently running.

kwargs (dict) â€“ tpa_hint (string): An override flag that will return a matching provideras long as its configuration has been enabledis_register_page (bool): Determine the call is from register or login page is_welcome_page (bool): Checks if the call is from the Welcome Page
